::Spears::

She sighed.  "Well, it was noble ship." she looked down with a 
dissapointed look on her face.  "Well, if there is something savable 
of this ship, let's find it and use it on the new ship."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker shruggs, putting Rhinox into a CR chamber.
> 
> "He'll be fine," he says, looking at Spears. He turns his head 
sharply as a 
> hallway collapses, panels smashing into the floor, "The Ark, on the 
other 
> hand, is dying. That blast took it over the edge."
